data_table.description: EDIC. Health care delivery of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: GOB1
variable.description: B1. Health care insurance coverage. In past 12 months was there anytime you did not have health insurance?

variable.name: GOB2
variable.description: B2. Health care insurance coverage. How long were you without coverage of insurance?

variable.name: GOB3
variable.description: B3. Health care insurance coverage. Currently do you have health insurance coverage?

variable.name: GOB4BA
variable.description: B4ba. Health insurance coverage: individual plan - member pays

variable.name: GOB4BB
variable.description: B4bb. Health insurance coverage: group plan - employer pays

variable.name: GOB4BC
variable.description: B4bc. Health insurance coverage: Government plan - government pays

variable.name: GOB4BC1
variable.description: B4bc1. Health insurance coverage: U.S. Government Health Plan

variable.name: GOB4BC2
variable.description: B4bc2. Health insurance coverage: Canadian Government Plan

variable.name: GOB4BC3
variable.description: B4bc3. Health insurance coverage: Medicaid

variable.name: GOB4BC4
variable.description: B4bc4. Health insurance coverage: Medicare

variable.name: GOB4CA
variable.description: B4ca. Health insurance coverage. Indemnity or fee-for-service plan

variable.name: GOB4CB
variable.description: B4cb. Health insurance coverage. Health maintenance organization - HMO

variable.name: GOB4CC
variable.description: B4cc. Health insurance coverage. Preferred provider organization - PPO

variable.name: GOB4CD
variable.description: B4cd. Health insurance coverage. Point of service - POS

variable.name: GOB4CE
variable.description: B4ce. Health insurance coverage. Other: type of health insurance coverage

variable.name: GOB5A
variable.description: B5a. Health insurance coverage. Medical visits for diabetes (medical)

variable.name: GOB5B
variable.description: B5b. Health insurance coverage. Medical visits for diabetes (nurse)

variable.name: GOB5C
variable.description: B5c. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for insulin

variable.description: B5d. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for syringes

variable.description: B5e. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for blood glucose testing strips

variable.description: B5h. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for glucagon

variable.name: GOB5K
variable.description: B5k. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for glycosylated hemoglobin or HbA1c

variable.name: GOB5M
variable.description: B5m. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for blood tests

variable.name: GOB5N
variable.description: B5n. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for urine tests

variable.name: GOB5O
variable.description: B5o. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for electrocardiograms (EKG)

variable.name: GOB5W
variable.description: B5w. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for services of mental health profess

variable.name: GOB5X
variable.description: B5x. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for emergency room visits

variable.name: GOB5Y

variable.description: B5z. Health insurance coverage. If you currently have health insurance, does it provide coverage for hospitalization due to diabetes

variable.name: GOC1
variable.description: C1. Health care providers and sources of care. Where do you receive diabetes care
variable.value: Walk-in clinic or urgent care center
The EDIC annual evaluation is your only source of diabetes health care
There is no single location where you usually go for health care

variable.name: GOC2
variable.description: C2. Health care providers and sources of care. Who provides your diabetes care

variable.name: GOC3
variable.description: C3. Health care providers and sources of care. Was provider DCCT or EDIC staff

variable.name: GOC4
variable.description: C4. Health care providers and sources of care. Where do you receive general care
variable.value: Walk-in clinic or urgent care center
The EDIC annual evaluation is your only source of diabetes health care
